column1: '''Thrihyrne''' refers to the northernmost three steep-sided peaks of the [[White Mountains]]
column2: which also marked the southern edge of the wide [[Gap of Rohan]].

column1: They stood out above the gorge of [[Helm's Deep]]
column3: and could be seen behind the [[Hornburg]]
column4: built on an outlying northern spur known as the [[Hornrock]].<ref>{{TT|Deep}}</ref>
